attributes.action: Lower the amount of homework given to children because its causing problems!
attributes.additional_details: The extent of mental health problems in UK universities has been laid bare in a new YouGov survey of Britain’s students. More than a quarter of students (27%) report having a mental health problem of one type or another. This is extremely bad and having homework can really damage students minds. This is also only University STUDENTS!
attributes.background: Children who are currently in primary or secondary school should have less homework because the homework really gets to their mental health. Not all children have problems at home but if they do it can make them really anxious and even increase depression or suicidal thoughts.
